channel.title: Forums mailer plugin
channel.description:
i have downloaded 3 diffrent mass mailer type plugins and i cant get them to work everytime i go to send an email i get this error
Warning: mail() [function.mail]: Failed to connect to mailserver at "localhost" port 25, verify your "SMTP" and "smtp_port" setting in php.ini or use ini_set() in C:\wamp\www\include\email.php on line 93
Fatal error: Maximum execution time of 30 seconds exceeded in C:\wamp\www\include\email.php on line 95
if anyone could help me i would really appreciate it...im stumped =/

item.title: Forums mailer plugin
item.dc:creator: @rick12345 rick12345
item.description:
@rick12345 wrote:

[quote=“KO9, post:20, topic:241213”][quote author=Jordiescape link=topic=317535.msg2519546#msg2519546 date=1225818269]

This is Server and Client help, not w/e the fuck this is.

This isn’t RS2 you idiot…

I know, fucktard.

You jordie truly are a fucktard. The server registration page for rsc has been implemented to punBB forums therefore this question has something to do with “RSC” Server and client help.

You, person I’ve never heard of should give up now, cause RSC fails neway lololololo
[/quote]

He’s far more known in RSC than you are… Who are you?

OP: Read the error message, clearly states the problem and how to fix it.[/quote]

i did read it but i still dont understand it…

Read full topic
